subject: Re: UK website - holding page pre launch

full_threads.body:
Hi Anita, 

That's so wierd! 

Can I ask you to go directly to our client portal here: https://clients.wolfiq.com.au/

It will ask you for your email address and then send you a one time password to get in... Hopefully, you receive that, if not, please call me on 0415 162 271 and I can add the details in from my end.

Hi Heath,

No for some reason the CC email hasn't shown up.

I've checked my junk too and it isn't in there.

I'll go back to AC on the styling - I see what you mean

Thanks

a

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Anita, 

We have added the new form. The styling is a bit off... This needs to be controlled at the AC end though. Perhaps they can tweak it a little? 

Also, did you receive the CC email as yet?

Hi Heath,

Here you go for the form.

<div class="_form_3"></div><script src="https://stellainsurance.activehosted.com/f/embed.php?id=3" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>

With regards to the cc details - I haven't received it yet so just checking in.

Thanks

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Heath,

Thanks for sharing - it looks great!

I have chased up the form from our active campaign specialist.

Yes please send through the form so we can complete the set up / subscription.

Thanks

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Anita, 

Yes all good, here is the site: https://www.stellainsurance.co.uk/

Once we have the form, I'll do a final 'tidy up', but May 1 is very 'doable'! 

I will send you a form to add your CC details so that we can set up the subscription for this time for May 1 launch. FYI It's going to come from our parent company Wolf IQ.

Hi Heath,

Just checking in on this one.
Our Go Daddy account details are:

Login: renee@stellainsurance.com.au
Pw: Stella2019

I'll get the form from the active campaign team and send to you.

We need this switched on before 1 May so wondering if we're still ok for that?

Thanks
Anita

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Anita, 

Yes, Easter was awesome, hope yours was too. 

To answer your questions:

1. Yes please send through the access.
2. Yes, we can do it as a static page for now. 
3. Noted re Active Campaign form
4. Re Care Plan, I will send you a separate email shorlty. This will be to add you to our Wolf IQ billing platform. Once you enter in your details, we can then start your subscription. Wolf IQ is our parent company FYI. 
5. Yes we host international sites. The process is 100% the same. The site is still within Kinsta/Google Cloud, just on the UK servers.

Hi Heath,

Hope you had a good easter.


  2. What is the domain name you would like to host this website on? In go daddy - stellainsurance.co.uk Do you need access?

  3. Do you want us to clone the AU site on to the UK server? You will need to be careful about duplicate content. My recommendation is that we build it correctly (i.e. better than the previous dev's did) and then we/you can add in your new content. Do we need to decide this yet - can it just be a static page.

  4. Can you please send is the Active Campaign form to embed? Yes will get this for you.

  5. We will need you to sign up for a new care plan, probably our Lite Plan will be fine for the short term: wpperk.com Yes Lite plan is fine thanks


Do you host any sites internationally for other clients? Are there any differences we need to be aware of eg security etc?

Thanks

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Thanks Anita, 

We can set up this landing page for you. A couple of questions please:

  1. What is the domain name you would like to host this website on? 
  2. Do you want us to clone the AU site on to the UK server? You will need to be careful about duplicate content. My recommendation is that we build it correctly (i.e. better than the previous dev's did) and then we/you can add in your new content. 
  3. Can you please send is the Active Campaign form to embed? 
  4. We will need you to sign up for a new care plan, probably our Lite Plan will be fine for the short term: wpperk.com
I think that's it for now!

@heath can you check it now if good https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/landing-page-subs/

by the way, the campaign form that I used on the page is taken from the footer as a sample because what I understand they need to create the campaign form. is it right? Thanks

code embed:
"<div></div><script src="https://stellainsurance.activehosted.com/f/embed.php?id=1" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>"
@manuel can you please create the attached page on the stellainsurance.com.au website? Cheers

Hi Heath,

I've just done a mock up of the holding page for you.

Please see attached.

Ideally I'd like the subscription to link through to our Active campaign platform but we would need to set up a separate list for it to feed into that sits outside of the AU contacts. I can work with our active campaign specialist to help with this.

Please let me know if you need anything else. I have added the image and the logo for you too.

Thanks

Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Anita, 

Yes, this sounds great! Send of the brief please and we will get to work.
@heath Hi Heath, Is it ok to duplicate the stellainsurance site right away? or lets wait for the formal brief to do that?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Hope you're well.

We are looking to launch in the UK later this year which is very exciting.
We wanted to set up a holding page website with a bit of a 'coming soon message' and a 'sign up to learn more' web form capture.

Is this something you would be able to help us create and set up?
We have the URL already but would need your help with hosting etc.

Please let me know and I can arrange copy / imagery / formal brief.

Thanks,
Anita


Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

Level 15, 50 Pitt St, Sydney NSW 2000

m 0404 968 482

e anita@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au
